data.text:
@ChiPublicHealth @ChiPubSchools @PedroCPSCEO My kids teachers go above and beyond every. single. day.  And I'm not just talking about the way they're essentially acting as nurses and psych help for freaked out sick kids.

Disgusting the way this parrot is now playing politics instead of doing anything but letting COVID ride
@ChiPublicHealth @ChiPubSchools @PedroCPSCEO If you ever wanted confirmation that Arwady is simply a mouthpiece for Lightfoot, it's her saying "people have lost trust in teachers"
